jd: From: Hemant Rawat, convextech hemant@convextech.com Reply to: hemant@convextech.com Title: Java Technical LeadLocation:Hybrid(Durham, NC)- Must be Local to Durham ,NC only - Every Wednesday onsiteDuration: 9 months contractVisa Restrictions: Only USC or GCMode of Interview:PS Job Description: We are seeking a Lead Engineer to support the development of next-generation clinical data applications. This role involves hands-on work in creating scalable, secure solutions that process and analyze large data sets. You’ll contribute actively to sprints and work closely with the team, jumping in to resolve complex challenges and support POCs as needed. Responsibilities Build backend services with Java and Spring Boot and design frontend applications in AngularCollaborate with product and clinical teams to address technical needs and refine user-facing featuresContribute to architectural decisions and lead POCs to explore new solutions Required Experience and Skills: Big data experience (e.g., Spark, Hadoop)Knowledge of healthcare compliance (e.g., HIPAA, GDPR)Manager - Software Development (Healthcare Data Engineering)Proficiency in Java and Spring Boot (willingness to code as needed)10+ years in software development, with at least 3 years in a management roleExperience with Azure and Microsoft Fabric for cloud solutionsStrong understanding of Angular for front-end managementSkills - Java, Spring Boot, Azure and Microsoft Fabric, Angular Thanks and Regards Hemant Rawat US IT Recruiter |Convex Tech Inc.Email: hemant@convextech.comwww.linkedin.com/in/hemantrawatt
